description: The Paonia Clog is your everyday essential. We kept our signature LUVSEAT™ footbed to ensure the same comfort of a Z/Sandal, but added a closed-toe silhouette. The upper material is a low nap suede that gives off a casual vibe, but can still be dressed up when the occasion arises. A rubber outsole and PU midsole provides traction and support for all day wear. The Paonia Clog is ready to be worn every day of the week.
name: Chaco Paonia Clog - Mens
